firstStep.title: First Step
firstStep.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their abilities. Follow the instructions to reach the goal while learning the new action.

enchancedEnemy.title: Enhanced Enemy
enchancedEnemy.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their abilities. Defeat the enhanced Pettas Sword using your battle skills.
enchancedEnemy.subMission3: Clear having taken damage fewer than 10 times

swiftJump.title: Swift Jump
swiftJump.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their abilities. Reach the goal using "Jump" and "Double Jump".
swiftJump.subMission3: Clear while using used Glide fewer than 5 times

wildRush.title: Wild Rush
wildRush.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their abilities. Defeat all enemies using your battle skills.

testFlight.title: Test Flight
testFlight.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their gliding capabilities. Use Photon Glide to reach the target destination.

roaringRush.title: Roaring Rush
roaringRush.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their combat abilities. Make use of your battle skills to defeat the Gororox.
roaringRush.subMission2: Clear having taken damage fewer than 15 times

fleetingFight.title: Fleeting Fight
fleetingFight.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their combat abilities. Make use of your battle skills to defeat the Bujin.
fleetingFight.subMission3: Clear having taken damage fewer than 20 times

runway.title: Runway
runway.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their dashing capabilities. Use Photon Dash to reach the target destination.

vanishingPath.title: Vanishing Path
vanishingPath.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their dashing capabilities. Defeat all the enemies while keeping an eye on Vanishing Blocks.

narrowCage.title: Narrow Cage
narrowCage.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their dashing capabilities. Make use of your battle skills to defeat all of the enemies.
narrowCage.subMission1: Clear without taken damage fewer than 20 times

buddyAttack.title: Buddy Attack
buddyAttack.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their dashing capabilities. Defeat all the enemies with support from Dromes.
buddyAttack.subMission1: Maintain your hacked Drome's level to 3 to clear
buddyAttack.subMission3: Clear without taken damage fewer than 20 times

dynaAssault.title: Dyna Assault
dynaAssault.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their dashing capabilities. Make use of your battle skills to defeat the Lizentos.
dynaAssault.subMission3: Clear without taken damage fewer than 10 times

parkourMaster.title: Parkour Master
parkourMaster.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their dashing capabilities. Reach the goal using Jumps, Double Jumps, and Wall Kicks.
parkourMaster.subMission1: Clear having used Glide fewer than 6 times

runway2.title: Runway II
runway2.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their dashing capabilities. Use Photon Dash to reach the target destination.

crazyTail.title: Crazy Tail
crazyTail.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their combat abilities. Make use of your battle skills to defeat the Pangolan.
crazyTail.subMission3: Clear having taken damage fewer than 7 times

slopeTile.title: Slope Style
slopeTile.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their dashing capabilities. Use floating boards to reach the target destination.
slopeTile.subMission2: Clear having used Glide fewer than 2 times

wildAvalanche.title: Wild Avalanche
wildAvalanche.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their combat abilities. Make use of your battle skills to defeat the Ice Banser.
wildAvalanche.subMission2: Clear having taken damage fewer than 12 times
wildAvalanche.subMission3: Clear having used Restasigne fewer than 3 times

vanishingPath2.title: Vanishing Path II
vanishingPath2.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their dashing capabilities. Use Photon Dash to reach the target destination.
vanishingPath2.subMission3: Clear having used Glide fewer than 3 times

clockworkJail.title: Clockwork Prison
clockworkJail.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their combat abilities. Make use of your battle skills to defeat all of the enemies.
clockworkJail.subMission3: Clear having taken damage fewer than 10 times

holibleFlapping.title: Horrible Flapping
holibleFlapping.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their combat abilities. Make use of your battle skills to defeat the Malachroid.
holibleFlapping.subMission3: Clear having taken damage fewer than 12 times

quarterstaff.title: Quarterstaff
quarterstaff.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their combat abilities. Make use of your battle skills to defeat the Engoku.
quarterstaff.subMission3: Clear having taken damage fewer than 7 times

faceTheDarkness.title: Face the Darkness
faceTheDarkness.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their combat abilities. Make use of your battle skills to defeat the Dark Lemnas.
faceTheDarkness.subMission3: Clear having taken damage fewer than 7 times

helicalLine.title: Helical Line
helicalLine.description: This is Trainia, where ARKS defenders can test their dashing capabilities. Make use of your athletic abilities to reach the target destination.
helicalLine.subMission2: Clear having used Glide fewer than 7 times
